info.name: YouTube - Simple (LIGHT)
info.description: Please note, this theme is in Early development, there are bound to be bugs. :\ Dark Version: YouTube - Simple (DARK) This will be updated soon. When I think the dark version is ready, I'll re-create this version.
info.additionalInfo: !!! UPDATES !!! (Australian Time) V1.3.1 (March 9th, 2017) : - Centered banner for resolutions below 1555px wide. V1.3 (February 28th, 2017) : - Updated theme. V1.2.3 (September 4th, 2016) : - Tweaks to Watch page. - Tweaks to Homepage. V1.2.2 (September 4th, 2016) : - Minor tweaks to homepage. ^ Just making it look better. V1.2.1 (September 3rd, 2016) : - Changed "Watched" on videos. - Every thing on the website now has a border radius of 0. - Removed homepage ad V1.2 (September 3rd, 2016) : - Centered things on Channel page. - Search bar looks more sexy. - Minor fixes to Homepage. - Fixed video player clipping through "Up Next" section. V1.1.1 (September 2nd, 2016) : - Fixed quality of banner for resolutions 1366x768 and above. V1.1 (September 1st, 2016) : - Minor fixed to homepage. - Users are able to chose if they want maxed channel page. ^ This is a work in progress so there WILL be bugs. V1.0 (September 1st, 2016) : - First release.
